text: Alʙatta Alloh dar kitoʙi Qur'on, ʙar sumo nozil karda, ki cun ʙisnaved, ki ojathoi Alloh inkor karda mesavand, jo ojoti vaj ʙa tamasxur girifta mesavad, pas nanisined ʙo onon (ja'ne, ʙo munkironu tamasxurkunandagon), to on ki ʙa suxani digare ʙipardozand, hamono sumo agar ʙinisined va gus dihed, pas monandi on kofiron ʙosed. (Zero rozi sudan dar gunoh va onro taƣjir nadodan misli gunoh kardan ast). Hamono Alloh jakco sozad munofiqonu kofironro dar duzax
